description: Details of sound insulation of building envelope pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission ref: 244298FUL dated 08/01/2025 for: Conversion of single dwellinghouse into two self-contained flats with provision of cycle and refuse storage
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details relating to the desktop study for aircraft noise sound insulation, pursuant to condition 4 of planning application Ref: 244298FUL dated 08/01/2025 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan 2021.
